other_title: 絶対無敵ライジンオー (Japanese)
plot: The story revolves around a group of elementary school children who are given command of a mecha named Raijin-Oh and their efforts to defend the Earth from the evil Jaku Empire.
ending_theme: "Chikyuu Boueigumi Ouenka" by Chikyuu Boueigumi Gasshotai
insert_song: "Bokura no Hero・Zettai Muteki Raijin-Oh" by Rica Matsumoto (ep 45)
"Otoko ga Moeru Hinobori Kaikyou" by Rica Matsumoto (ep 45)
"Rival Ouenka・Jaku Teikoku VS Chikyuu Boueigumi" by Jaku Teikoku & Chikyuu Boueigumi Gasshotai (ep 45)
